com.st.st25sdk.command

Interface Type4CommandInterface

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    M24SR02KTag, M24SR04KTag, M24SR16KTag, M24SR64KTag, M24SRTag, M24SRTAHighDensityTag, ST25TA02KBDTag, ST25TA02KBPTag, ST25TA02KBTag, ST25TA02KDTag, ST25TA02KPTag, ST25TA02KTag, ST25TA16KTag, ST25TA512BTag, ST25TA512Tag, ST25TA64KTag, ST25TAGpoTag, ST25TATag, STType4MultiAreaTag, STType4Tag, Type4Command, Type4CustomCommand, Type4Tag

    public interface Type4CommandInterface
    Defines the common methods to be implemented to build NFC Forum Type4 commands

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description

    • Method Detail

      • selectFile

        byte[] selectFile(int fileId)
           throws STException
        Function allowing to select a file by FileId. Warning: It is the caller responsibility to use a lock to prevent simultaneous accesses to the tag.
        Parameters:
        fileId - File identifier
        Returns:
        the received response
        Throws:
        STException

        data - File identifier
        Returns:
        array of bytes R-apdu
